Create LPPSRC using AIX DVD isos

  1. Download the DVDs from IBM entitled software website
  2. Mount them
    sudo mkdir -p /mnt/dvd1 /mnt/dvd2
sudo loopmount -i aix7.1-dvd1.iso -o "-V cdrfs -o ro" -m /mnt/dvd1
sudo loopmount -i aix7.1-dvd2.iso -o "-V cdrfs -o ro" -m /mnt/dvd2
  3. Define a lppsrouce
    sudo nim -o define -t lpp_source -a server=master -a source=/mnt/dvd1 -a location=/prod/images/lppsrc/710TL03-03 710TL03-03_lppsrc
  4. Update/Add packages from the second DVD.
    sudo nim -o update -a packages=all -a source=/mnt/dvd2 710TL03-03_lppsrc
  5. Update NIM server to the level on lppsrc, reboot.
  6. Define a Spot
    sudo nim -o define -t spot -a server=master -a source=710TL03-03_lppsrc -a location=/prod/images/spot/710TL03-03_spot 710TL03-03_spot
